name: Retro Netflix TV
description:
This is skeuomorphic imagination of retro Netflix TV made completely in Figma. This is just a blend of gradients, drop shadows and inner shadows used in various combinations. I have used photos and renders of many retro TVs and Macintosh Classics before making this.


Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to reach out to me.
